conversations.body_text:
I haven't received my goods, please send me a full refund or I'll have no option but to put a dispute through PayPal.
I would appreciate a response asap

Hi steve zzzzzzz,    We apologize for the delayed response; we've just returned from our holiday break. Here is your shipping tracking link. The product you purchased has been out of stock for nearly two weeks due to overwhelming demand. We sincerely apologize for the delay this has caused.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047211837296
